messages.subject: Re: Sort of OT---Joe Odagiri
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the heads up on that. Odagiri is also in a  film that is recently out or is coming out about Japanese jazz musicians  right after WWII  I can t
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the heads up on that. Odagiri is also in a film that is
recently out or is coming out about Japanese jazz musicians right after
WWII I can't remember the name but there was an interview (in Japanese
of course) with a musician who is apparently crossing over into acting
with this film. They showed a brief portion with subtitles and it seemed
really good.

Tiffany wrote:

>Joe Odagiri is the actor portraying Saitou Hajime in the NHK TAiga
>drama...so I did some online stalking...errr research and found that he
>was in the following movies
>
>BRIGHT FUTURE dir. by Kiyoshi Kurosawa ALSO starring Tadanobu
>Asano *hottie* (starred in Gohatto/Taboo and Gojoe)
>
>AZUMI...I can't really recommend this film because the director also
>directed a film called VERSUS which was -horrible- and reviewers are
>saying that AZUMI is basically VERSUS with swords...

messages.subject: Sort of OT---Joe Odagiri
messages.msgSnippet: Joe Odagiri is the actor portraying Saitou Hajime in the NHK TAiga drama...so I did some online stalking...errr research and found that he was in the following
messages.messageBody:
Joe Odagiri is the actor portraying Saitou Hajime in the NHK TAiga
drama...so I did some online stalking...errr research and found that he
was in the following movies

BRIGHT FUTURE dir. by Kiyoshi Kurosawa ALSO starring Tadanobu
Asano *hottie* (starred in Gohatto/Taboo and Gojoe)

AZUMI...I can't really recommend this film because the director also
directed a film called VERSUS which was -horrible- and reviewers are
saying that AZUMI is basically VERSUS with swords...
